subject:
The Internet Patrol -  How to Change the Quote Attribution Line in the Mac'
 s Mail.app Mail Program
body:
The Internet Patrol


 The Internet Patrol

How to Change the Quote Attribution Line in the Mac's Mail.app Mail Program

If you are anything like me, you quickly got tired of having to delete the "On such-and-such a date, so-and-so wrote:" attribution quote line every ..single ..time ..you replied to an email in Mac's native mail program, Mail.app.  Here's how to change it. 

Read more here: How to Change the Quote Attribution Line in the Mac's Mail.app Mail Program
